BattleEffectText.Name: Red String
BattleEffectText.Desc: Combat Start, gain a Counter Guard die (6-10 On Clash Lose Remove self's Red String) After {0} Scene remove all enemies' Red String, making them lose 20% Max Hp (not Lethal) and summon a Mx. Bunny

BattleEffectText.Name: Stupified
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, increase incoming Damage and Stagger Damage by 50%

BattleEffectText.Name: Puppet Strings
BattleEffectText.Desc: {0} Speed dice with the lowest Speed become uncontrollable, targeting allies for attacks. (Can stack up to 3) At the end of each Scene, reduce 1 stack.

BattleEffectText.Name: Vampiric Rampage
BattleEffectText.Desc: Have recovered {0} health during this Act

BattleEffectText.Name: Recovery Hijack
BattleEffectText.Desc: For {0} Scene whenever self recover health, the inflicter reocver half amount of health as well.

BattleEffectText.Name: Unjust Contract: Power
Unjust Contract: Power
Contract Dividend: Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice of Pages of which Cost is {0} gain +3 Pages

BattleEffectText.Name: Unjust Contract: Proctect
Unjust Contract: Proctect
Contract Dividend: Proctect
BattleEffectText.Desc: Reduce incoming Damage and Stagger Damage by -50% for the duration of the Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Unjust Contract: Haste
Unjust Contract: Haste
Contract Dividend: Haste
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 2 additional Speed Dice for the duration of the Scene.
